about_the_game:
Detective Patch is a 2D side-scrolling detective RPG all about solving a wacky mystery and fighting all sorts of bizarre weirdos.




On a cold and subdued night, a stranger in the dark steals the mayor’s precious ruby, a heirloom that holds immense power, and could possibly lead to the destruction of the world! Will Detective Patch (with the help of some odd allies) be able to find whodunnit before it’s too late?




Take a stroll through Hazelnut Plaza, a place filled with all sorts of cool stuff to see and do! You can try to stay focused and solve the case as fast as you can, or relax and take the adventure at your own pace. The plaza can change throughout the day depending on certain actions you take, so stay alert!




Fight with traditional turn-based combat, or use the unique interrogation system to deal with enemies without causing any harm. Doing so will provide you with more clues and extra goodies.




Use your wits and trusty clue book to solve any puzzle that stands in your way! But what does it all mean? I don't know, buy the game to find out or something. (I'm no psychic...)




  • 5 different areas in the plaza that you can explore to your heart's content
  • 3 giant dungeons
  • 2 more parts planned for the near future
  • 5-6 hours of gameplay (For normal playthroughs)
  • Tons of unlockable costumes
  • Cool soundtrack 
  • Sound Test
  • Trophy gallery
  • A fun and unique battle system
  • funny characters and dialogue 
  • Loads of fun boss fights
  • 10 suspects with varying personalities 
  • A lighthearted story with a sprinkle of depth
  • Secret Bosses?
  • A good time... hopefully :)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any type that can run simple 2D games
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any type
  • Additional Notes: Intel and Silicon Macs are supported!
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Any type of Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any type that can run simple 2D games
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any type
  • Additional Notes: This is a low performance game, you should be ok.

short_description: Detective Patch is an adorable 2D turn-based RPG where you solve mysteries and interrogate enemies. Battle menacing foes, meet quirky characters, and solve the mystery of the stolen ruby.
